name: battlesort
description: Enables event-driven, one-by-one comparison sorting of a list of things

scripts.clean: rm src/**/*.js; rm src/*.js; rm -rf dist/
scripts.bundle:demo: yarn run clean; node_modules/.bin/rollup --config rollup.config.js; yarn run build; cp src/demo.js dist/; cp index.html dist/

author: Tim Growney & Jesse Avshalomov
